text: COMPENSATION LOG RECORDS A CLR describes the actions taken to undo the actions of a previous update record. It has all the fields of an update log record plus the pointer (the next-to-be-undone LSN). CLRs are added to log like any other record. | £2CMU-DB 4 » PI o) 2555/1:18:06 - TRANSACTION COMMIT > 8 « J I e e - 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
